description.p: You have resistance to cold damage while you hold this staff.
The staff has 5 charges. While holding it, you gain a charge per spell level +1 when a cold spell is casted within 60ft until 5 or more chargers are gathered

When all 5 charges are filled the next spell used by the user will be agmented roll d6 - X (X = numbers of chargers above 5) 1: all creatures within 10 ft take (1+X)d6 cold damage2:gain the side effects of both ray of frost and frostbite for 1 turn3:Gain temporary hit points = (1+X)"*"proficiency level4:Grant another creature within 60ft resistence to cold damage for 1+X turns5:Gain a use of chromatic orb : cold as a bonus action for this turn only6:Refresh 1 spell slot of level= 1+X or lower
Staff can only be used proficiency times per long rest

set.name: attunement
set.addition: by a druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard, that knows a spell that deals cold damage
